author: James Dawson
description: Ruben Fleischer is likely to be the director.
title: Tom Hardy Will Play The Lead In New 'Venom' Movie  | LADbible

author: Jonathon Dornbush
description: Tom Hardy will star as Eddie Brock in the Venom solo film, which will be directed by Zombieland's Ruben Fleischer.
title: Venom: Tom Hardy to Star, Zombieland Director to Helm for 2018 Release - IGN
